name: 0b031ff9-586e-4432-9aa0-c4bf3a82a4e7
displayName: > get original order ID details API

text: <speak>As per our records, we have found $sys.func.COUNT($flow.duplicate_order_id) orders ending with same 5 digits <say-as interpret-as="verbatim">$flow.user_provided_last_five_digit_of_order_id</say-as>. Which order are you looking for?<break time="1s"/> Order number 1 which was placed on <say-as interpret-as="date" format="yyyymmdd" detail="1">$flow.all_order_date[0]</say-as> at <say-as interpret-as="time" format="hms12">$flow.all_order_time[0]</say-as><break time="1s"/> or Order number 2 which was placed on <say-as interpret-as="date" format="yyyymmdd" detail="1">$flow.all_order_date[1]</say-as> at <say-as interpret-as="time" format="hms12">$flow.all_order_time[1]</say-as>.</speak>
We apologize for the inconvenience. Our system is currently experiencing technical issues. Our technical team is actively working to resolve this issue. Please try again after sometime.
We apologize for the inconvenience. Our system is currently experiencing technical issues. Our technical team is actively working to resolve this issue. Please try again after sometime.
